item.title: Projects
item.description: TTT Reborn C#, SCSS, s&box (Present) TTT Reborn is the re-imagining of the popular Garry’s Mod TTT gamemode built for s&box Programmed core networking game logic for the project S&box Crosshair C#, SCSS, s&box (May 2021) A complete static crosshair system built for usage within s&box Retter - Flutter Reddit App Dart, Flutter (Jun 2020) A complete Reddit experience built using Flutter Open sourced and contributed to by other developers Built for iOS and Android Social Gaming App C++, GoogleTest, CMake (Jan 2020 - Apr 2020)
